resources.string: Thank you for installing DASUT \n- a research project undertaken by a few inquisitive minds, who wish to study trends of smartphone services\' usage.
Data is the new oil, and that\'s exactly how the next generation of intelligent services will serve us better. Help us understand that intelligence.
The app will collect nominal data which will help us study the trends of usage of services and applications in a smartphone. No personal data will be misused. Pinky Promise.
To see the welcome slider again, goto Settings -> apps -> welcome slider -> clear data
